::: Finally, it had happened. The hull to the Maximal ship cracked and split 
large enough to allow the Predacons through. Marine, who made the shot, ran 
through first, followed by Inferno, and the burnt and smoking Rampage. :::

::: Marine on comm to Hell Beast ::: Commander, we have made it into the 
Maximal base! We are victorious!

::: Inferno and Ramapge sleeked through the corridor they were in, 
remembering the internal defense systems from last time. It was hard to walk 
because of all the firing from outside, but Inferno stumbled into a room 
containing CR chambers. :::

::: Inferno ::: Hah! They wont be needing these any more!

::: He sent a series of fire balls into the chambers, filling the room with 
fire and smoke which started to spread. :::

::: Rampage ::: You fool! The ship is on fire!

::: Inferno ::: It shall BURN!

::: Rampage shighed and continued onward until the threesome came up to a 
heavy door :::

::: Marine ::: This must be the bridge. Once we get inside....

::: He stopped short with a large smile. Once inside they could take the ship 
for real. It would be theres to control. :::
